admission_plugins.Description: The list of admission plugins to enable on the cluster

auto_upgrade.Description: The auto upgrade configuration for the cluster

enable.Description: Enables the Kubernetes patch version auto upgrade

maintenance_window_start_hour.Description: Start hour of the 2-hour maintenance window

autoscaler_config.Description: The autoscaler configuration for the cluster

balance_similar_node_groups.Description: Detect similar node groups and balance the number of nodes between them

disable_scale_down.Description: Disable the scale down feature of the autoscaler

estimator.Description: Type of resource estimator to be used in scale up

expander.Description: Type of node group expander to be used in scale up

expendable_pods_priority_cutoff.Description: Pods with priority below cutoff will be expendable. They can be killed without any consideration during scale down and they don't cause scale up. Pods with null priority (PodPriority disabled) are non expendable

ignore_daemonsets_utilization.Description: Ignore DaemonSet pods when calculating resource utilization for scaling down

scale_down_delay_after_add.Description: How long after scale up that scale down evaluation resumes

scale_down_unneeded_time.Description: How long a node should be unneeded before it is eligible for scale down

cni.Description: The CNI plugin of the cluster

created_at.Description: The date and time of the creation of the Kubernetes cluster

delete_additional_resources.Description: Delete additional resources like block volumes and loadbalancers on cluster deletion

enable_dashboard.Description: Enable the dashboard on the cluster

feature_gates.Description: The list of feature gates to enable on the cluster

ingress.Description: The ingress to be deployed on the cluster

kubeconfig.Description: The kubeconfig configuration file of the Kubernetes cluster
